column8: One thing that is prevalent with bijan is that all project related to him must be named idiotically.

More bad news for Bandar MalaysiaWanda Group Boss in trouble with China gahmen..18 Jul 2017https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4363433https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4363446...The Wall Street Journal reported that China’s regulators had ordered the nation’s big banks to put the brakes on loans to Dalian Wanda Group, which had been approached by Prime Minister Najib Razak to help salvage the project...Now that its loan facilities have been curtailed, the giant Dalian Wanda Group may not be able to get involved in the project.
